text:
@realDonaldTrump It’s a shame someone isn’t doing something about the Coronavirus.
It’s a shame someone isn’t doing something about racism.
It’s a shame someone hasn’t released Reality Winner.
It’s a shame our government only panders to the wealthy.
It’s a shame people lie.
